markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2959) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Summoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=96)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2957); master in the skill associated with your [eidolon's](Eidolons.aspx) tradition

</column>

---

You gain the [expert bounded spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1485).

<title level="2">Expert Summoner Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Summoner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2961)
